            "title": [
              [
                "createRadialGradient … effectively creates a cone, touched by the two circles defined in the creation of the gradient, with the part of the cone before the start circle (0.0) using the color of the first offset, the part of the cone after the end circle (1.0) using the color of the last offset, and areas outside the cone untouched by the gradient (transparent black)."
              ]
            ]
          },

          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",

          "id": "506a1625-5681-4d04-abf0-31957412d458",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",

          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              [
                "For all values of ω where r(ω) > 0, starting with the value of ω nearest to positive infinity and ending with the value of ω nearest to negative infinity, draw the circumference of the circle with radius r(ω) at position (x(ω), y(ω)), with the color at ω, but only painting on the parts of the canvas that have not yet been painted on by earlier circles in this step for this rendering of the gradient."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "numbered_list",
          "version": 1
        }
      },

          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              [
                "The createRadialGradient(x0, y0, r0, x1, y1, r1) method takes six arguments, the first three representing the start circle with origin (x0, y0) and radius r0, and the last three representing the end circle with origin (x1, y1) and radius r1. The values are in coordinate space units. If either of r0 or r1 are negative, an IndexSizeError exception must be thrown. Otherwise, the method must return a radial CanvasGradient initialized with the two specified circles."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",

          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["When you "],
              ["stroke()", [["c"]]],
              [" or "],
              ["fill()", [["c"]]],
              [
                " a path, the invisible gradient is revealed, but only revealed over that path being stroked or filled."

        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1551949703388,
          "id": "a02c6807-f8fc-4ae9-a577-9d3967bee26e",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1594619760000,
          "parent_id": "9c279acb-8a2e-4861-a793-6bcf3ba95262",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["HTML"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "<!doctype html>\n<html>\n<head>\n<style>\n    body{ background-color:white; padding:10px; }\n    #canvas{border:1px solid blue; }\n</style>\n<script>\nwindow.onload=(function(){\n\n    // canvas related vars\n    var canvas=document.getElementById(\"canvas\");\n    var ctx=canvas.getContext(\"2d\");\n    \n    // create a radial gradient\n    var x1=150;\n    var y1=175;\n    var x2=350;\n    var y2=175;\n    var r1=100;\n    var r2=40;\n    x2=x1;\n    var gradient=ctx.createRadialGradient(x1,y1,r1,x2,y2,r2);\n    gradient.addColorStop(0,'red');\n    gradient.addColorStop(1,'green');\n    ctx.fillStyle=gradient;\n\n    // fill a path with the gradient\n    ctx.beginPath();\n    ctx.moveTo(150,0);\n    ctx.lineTo(300,150);\n    ctx.lineTo(150,325);\n    ctx.lineTo(0,150);\n    ctx.lineTo(150,0);\n    ctx.fill();\n\n}); // end window.onload\n</script>\n</head>\n<body>\n    <canvas id=\"canvas\" width=300 height=325></canvas>\n</body>\n</html>"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 7
        }
      },

            "title": [
              [
                "Let x(ω) = (x1-x0)ω + x0; Let y(ω) = (y1-y0)ω + y0; Let r(ω) = (r1-r0)ω + r0 Let the color at ω be the color at that position on the gradient (with the colors coming from the interpolation and extrapolation described above)."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
